languages.text: "Я попал под следствие, но был оправдан и назначен на Благочестие, без Глейто. Самый коррумпированный мир-улей в Друзианской Марке, два года среди самых поганых представителей Человечества... Меня проверяли, и я прошел проверку — мне дали повышение, вернули Глейто, но после предательства Эммерсона я уже не был прежним".

"I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."
languages.original_text: "Я попал под следствие, но был оправдан и назначен на Благочестие, без Глейто. Самый коррумпированный мир-улей в Друзианской Марке, два года среди самых поганых представителей Человечества... languages.text: 「私は調査対象になりましたが、嫌疑は晴れ、グライトなしでパイエティに配属されました。ドルスス・マーチズで最も腐敗した過密惑星でした。最も汚れた人類の屑どもに囲まれての二年間…それはテストでした。私は耐えて昇進を勝ち取り、グライトも取り戻しました。ですが、エマーソンの裏切りの後、私はもう以前の私ではなくなったのです」
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: 「私は調査対象になりましたが、嫌疑は晴れ、グライトなしでパイエティに配属されました。ドルスス・マーチズで最も腐敗した過密惑星でした。最も汚れた人類の屑どもに囲まれての二年間…それはテストでした。私は耐えて昇進を勝ち取り、グライトも取り戻しました。ですが、エマーソンの裏切りの後、私はもう以前の私ではなくなったのです」

languages.text: "Es gab eine Untersuchung, aber ich wurde freigesprochen und nach Piety versetzt, ohne Glaito. Die korrupteste Makropolwelt in den Drusus-Marken. Zwei Jahre unter dem übelsten Abschaum der Menschheit ... Es war eine Prüfung, und ich bestand – wurde befördert und erhielt Glaito zurück. Aber nach Emmersons Verrat war ich nie mehr derselbe."
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab eine Untersuchung, aber ich wurde freigesprochen und nach Piety versetzt, ohne Glaito. Die korrupteste Makropolwelt in den Drusus-Marken. Zwei Jahre unter dem übelsten Abschaum der Menschheit ... Es war eine Prüfung, und ich bestand – wurde befördert und erhielt Glaito zurück. Aber nach Emmersons Verrat war ich nie mehr derselbe."

languages.text: « J'ai fait l'objet d'une enquête, qui n'a toutefois pas abouti. On m'a envoyé sur Piété, le monde ruche le plus corrompu des Marches de Drusus. Sans Glaito. J'ai passé deux ans parmi la lie de l'Humanité... Mais il s'agissait d'une mise à l'épreuve, que j'ai supportée. J'ai obtenu une promotion et récupéré la garde de Glaito. Mais depuis la trahison d'Emmerson, je ne suis plus le même homme. »
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fait l'objet d'une enquête, qui n'a toutefois pas abouti. On m'a envoyé sur Piété, le monde ruche le plus corrompu des Marches de Drusus. Sans Glaito. J'ai passé deux ans parmi la lie de l'Humanité... Mais il s'agissait d'une mise à l'épreuve, que j'ai supportée. J'ai obtenu une promotion et récupéré la garde de Glaito. Mais depuis la trahison d'Emmerson, je ne suis plus le même homme. »

languages.text: «Me sometieron a una investigación, pero quedé libre de todos los cargos y me asignaron a Piedad, sin Glaito. El mundo colmena más corrupto de toda la Marca de Drusus. Pasé dos años entre la peor escoria de la Humanidad... Fue una prueba, y la superé; conseguí mi ascenso, recuperé a Glaito. Pero después de la traición de Emmerson, ya nunca volví a ser el mismo».
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: «Me sometieron a una investigación, pero quedé libre de todos los cargos y me asignaron a Piedad, sin Glaito. El mundo colmena más corrupto de toda la Marca de Drusus. Pasé dos años entre la peor escoria de la Humanidad... Fue una prueba, y la superé; conseguí mi ascenso, recuperé a Glaito. Pero después de la traición de Emmerson, ya nunca volví a ser el mismo».

languages.text: “我接受了调查，洗脱了所有嫌疑。后来，我被派到了虔信之都，整个德鲁苏斯之征最腐败的巢都世界，在最堕落的人渣之中呆了两年，格雷托也没在我身边……那是给我的考验。我通过了考验，得到了晋升，重新夺回了格雷托。然而，自从遭到艾莫森背叛之后，我就变了。”
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: “我接受了调查，洗脱了所有嫌疑。后来，我被派到了虔信之都，整个德鲁苏斯之征最腐败的巢都世界，在最堕落的人渣之中呆了两年，格雷托也没在我身边……那是给我的考验。我通过了考验，得到了晋升，重新夺回了格雷托。然而，自从遭到艾莫森背叛之后，我就变了。”

languages.text: "Soruşturmaya alındım ama suçlamalardan aklandım. Ardından Glatio'yu elimden alıp beni Takva'ya atadılar. Drusus Bataklıkları'ndaki en yoz kovan dünyasına. İnsanlığın en aşağılık pislikleri arasında geçen koca iki yıl... Beni sınıyorlardı, sınavı geçip terfi edildim. Glaito'yu da yanıma aldım. Fakat Emmerson'ın ihanetinden sonra eski benden eser kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."

traits.locale_text: "Soruşturmaya alındım ama suçlamalardan aklandım. Ardından Glatio'yu elimden alıp beni Takva'ya atadılar. Drusus Bataklıklarındaki en yoz kovan dünyasına. İnsanlığın en aşağılık pislikleri arasında geçen koca iki yıl... Bu, bir imtihandı ve imtihanı geçtim, terfi edildim. Glaito'yu da yanıma aldım. Ama Emmerson'ın ihanetinden sonra eski benden artık eser kalmadı."

languages.original_text: "I was put under investigation, but was cleared of the charges and assigned to Piety, without Glaito. The most corrupt hive world in the Drusus Marches. Two years among the vilest dregs of Humanity... It was a test, and I passed — I got my promotion, got Glaito back. But after Emmerson's betrayal, I was never the same."
